languages.text: Выбрав сообщение в логе боя, вы можете подробнее узнать о факторах, повлиявших на результативность и эффективность действий как противников, так и ваших персонажей, например, увидеть источники дополнительного урона, защиты и шанса попадания.

You can select any line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chances.
languages.original_text: Выбрав сообщение в логе боя, вы можете подробнее узнать о факторах, повлиявших на результативность и эффективность действий как противников, так и ваших персонажей, например, увидеть источники дополнительного урона, защиты и шанса попадания.

traits.locale_text: You can select a line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chance.

You can select a line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chance.

You can select any line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chances.

You can select any line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chances.

You can select any line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chances.

languages.text: Du kannst eine beliebige Zeile im Kampflog auswählen, um mehr über die Faktoren zu erfahren, die die Effektivität der von deiner Gruppe und von deinen Feinden ausgeführten Aktionen beeinflussen, wie z. B. Quellen von Zusatzschaden, verbessertem Schutz oder modifizierten Trefferchancen.
languages.original_text: You can select any line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chances.

traits.locale_text: Du kannst eine beliebige Zeile im Kampflog auswählen, um mehr über die Faktoren zu erfahren, die die Effektivität der von deiner Gruppe und von deinen Feinden ausgeführten Aktionen beeinflussen, wie z. B. Quellen von Zusatzschaden, verbessertem Schutz oder modifizierten {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchancen{/g}.

languages.text: Vous pouvez sélectionner n'importe quelle ligne du journal de combat pour en savoir plus sur les facteurs qui influencent l'efficacité des actions de vos ennemis et de votre groupe, comme les sources de dégâts supplémentaires, la protection renforcée ou les chances de toucher modifiées.
languages.original_text: You can select any line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chances.

traits.locale_text: Vous pouvez sélectionner n'importe quelle ligne du journal de combat pour en savoir plus sur les facteurs qui influent sur l'efficacité des actions effectuées par vos ennemis et votre groupe, comme les sources de dégâts supplémentaires, la protection renforcée ou les chances d'{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}infliger un coup critique{/g} modifiées.

languages.text: 您可以任意点击附加战斗日志中的任何内容，详细了解您的敌人与您的队伍都采取了哪些行动，以及这些行动都受到了哪些因素影响，例如额外伤害的来源，保护效果，或是命中率的加值减值等等。
languages.original_text: You can select any line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chances.

traits.locale_text: 您可以任意点击附加战斗日志中的任何内容，详细了解您的敌人与您的队伍都采取了哪些行动，以及这些行动都受到了哪些因素影响，例如额外伤害的来源，保护效果，或是{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}的加值减值等等。

languages.text: Puedes seleccionar cualquier línea del registro de combate para profundizar en los factores que influyen en la efectividad de las acciones de tus enemigos y tu grupo, como algún motivo de daño adicional, protección mejorada o probabilidad de impacto alterada.
languages.original_text: You can select any line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chances.

traits.locale_text: Puedes seleccionar cualquier línea del registro de combate para profundizar en los factores que influyen en la efectividad de las acciones de tus enemigos y tu grupo, como algún motivo de daño adicional, protección mejorada o {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} alterada.

languages.original_text: By selecting a message in the battle log, you can learn more about the factors that affected the effectiveness and efficiency of both the opponents and your characters, such as seeing the sources of additional damage, defence and hit chance.

languages.text: 戦闘ログを選択すると、追加ダメージの発生源、強化した防御力、調整した命中率等、敵やパーティーのアクションの効果に影響を与える因子を調べることができる。
languages.original_text: You can select any line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chances.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘ログを選択すると、追加ダメージの発生源、強化した防御力、調整した{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}等、敵やパーティーのアクションの効果に影響を与える因子を調べることができる。

languages.text: Çatışma kayıtlarındaki herhangi bir satırı seçerek, düşmanların veya grubun tarafından gerçekleştirilen eylemlerin etkililiğini belirleyen faktörler (ilave hasarın, gelişmiş korumanın veya değişen vuruş olasılığının kaynakları gibi) hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinebilirsin.
languages.original_text: You can select any line in the combat log to learn more about the factors that impact the effectiveness of actions performed by your enemies and your party, such as sources of additional damage, enhanced protection, or modified hit chances.
